title: Miniature Portrait of Sir Samuel Garth (1661-1719)
medium: oil on copper; silver gilt frame
provenance_text:
C. W. Sotheby, by June 1865 [1]. Henry Symons [1871-1921], London, England; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, March 18, 1915) [2]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, March 18, 1915; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Exhibited at the South Kensington Museum exhibition of portrait miniatures, where it is listed as being lent by Mr. C. W. Sotheby. It is listed as number 1197. [2] Lot 1391.
